tours.title: Hunza Valley
tours.description: A breathtaking mountainous valley known for its stunning landscapes, ancient forts, and serene lakes.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Check-in
itinerary.description: Drive to Hunza, hotel check-in, rest.

itinerary.title: Altit & Baltit Forts
itinerary.description: Visit centuries-old forts and local museum.

itinerary.title: Eagle’s Nest & Hopper Glacier
itinerary.description: Sunrise viewpoint and glacier excursion.

itinerary.title: Attabad Lake & Passu Cones
itinerary.description: Boat ride and sightseeing of unique rock formations.

itinerary.title: Return Journey
itinerary.description: Drive back to Islamabad with scenic stops.

tours.title: Skardu
tours.description: Gateway to some of the world's highest peaks, with beautiful lakes and trekking trails.

itinerary.title: Travel to Skardu
itinerary.description: Journey begins from Islamabad.

itinerary.title: Kachura Lakes
itinerary.description: Explore Upper and Lower Kachura Lakes.

itinerary.title: Shangrila Resort
itinerary.description: Relax at Pakistan’s ‘Heaven on Earth’.

itinerary.title: Deosai National Park
itinerary.description: Visit the world's second highest plateau.

itinerary.title: Shigar Fort & Cold Desert
itinerary.description: Cultural visit and jeep safari.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Return to Islamabad.

tours.title: Nathia Gali
tours.description: A popular hill station known for pine forests, hiking trails, and cool weather.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Leisure
itinerary.description: Drive to Nathia Gali, explore local bazaar.

itinerary.title: Mushkpuri Trek
itinerary.description: Guided hike to Mushkpuri Top with picnic lunch.

itinerary.title: Mukshpuri Wildlife Track
itinerary.description: Forest walk and return journey.

tours.title: Fairy Meadows
tours.description: A stunning alpine meadow with majestic views of Nanga Parbat, the world's ninth highest mountain.

itinerary.title: Drive to Raikot Bridge
itinerary.description: Long drive and overnight camp near the bridge.

itinerary.title: Jeep Ride & Hike to Meadows
itinerary.description: 4x4 ride + 3-hour hike to reach Fairy Meadows.

itinerary.title: Explore Beyal Camp
itinerary.description: Optional hike to Beyal base camp of Nanga Parbat.

itinerary.title: Hike Back & Return
itinerary.description: Descend and drive back to Islamabad.

tours.title: Islamabad
tours.description: The capital city featuring modern architecture, parks, and cultural sites.

itinerary.title: Shopping & Culture
